definitions.definition: Any of several bulbous perennial plants , of the genus Fritillaria , having flowers with a spotted or chequered pattern.
Any of several butterflies , of the family Nymphalidae , having wings with black or silvery spots.

main_definition: Any of several bulbous perennial plants , of the genus Fritillaria , having flowers with a spotted or chequered pattern.
secondary_definitions: Any of several butterflies , of the family Nymphalidae , having wings with black or silvery spots.
